title: AI’s leadership crisis: Why CEOs must take responsibility before it’s too late
body: Artificial intelligence (AI) isn’t merely advancing, it’s exploding. From ChatGPT composing college essays to algorithms diagnosing diseases, tech is remaking our world faster than we can agree on its regulation. But here’s the paradox that no one seems to want to talk about enough: we’re constructing a future in which AI development outstrips accountability. Nothing captures that sentiment better than the NTT DATA report , ‘The AI Responsibility Gap: Why Leadership Is the Missing Link.’ In this study, 71% of executives acknowledged that their companies lack clear leadership on how to balance innovation with ethics. Translation? We’re barreling toward a cliff driverless! Excerpts from the NTT DATA report, ‘The AI Responsibility Gap: Why Leadership Is the Missing Link.’ Source: NTT DATA This leadership gap bodes ill for AI Ignoring responsible AI leadership can have weighty implications on platform security. This conclusion meshes with the study’s findings that 89% of CISO executives highly dread AI-related risks, but many companies don’t have effective risk-management plans. This unpreparedness leaves organizations vulnerable to cyber-attacks, data breaches, and inadvertent algorithmic discrimination — all of which can erode consumer trust and invite regulatory scrutiny. Likewise, the Sustainability vs. AI tug-of-war is concerning. That’s because technology devours tons of energy to power the data centers that are central to its functioning. In addition to this, there is a demand for immense computing power to train its models, and you can see how much it strains the available resources while increasing its carbon footprint . This reality has led tech giants like Google and Microsoft to build energy-efficient systems using renewable energy sources. AI leadership failures are not limited to issues of security and sustainability. They cover the whole range of societal challenges that affect nearly every aspect of our lives, from employment to misinformation. Therefore, the level of the public’s trust in the technology is defined by the organizational ability to innovate AI ethically. The AI sector is calling for strong leadership These problems will persist with the dearth of leadership in the AI space, dealing a body blow to the technology’s hope for greater acceptance. Therein lies the challenge for CEOs in this sector: providing it with robust leadership, but what does that entail? First, it requires adherence to the principle of “responsible by design”—ethical concerns integrated into the AI development process from the beginning. These leaders cannot afford to incorporate transparency, fairness, and security as an afterthought after completing the development process. Again, companies need a robust governance framework beyond the minimum regulation requirements. They must set up internal guidelines to ensure accountability, review AI policies on a routine basis, and create a culture of responsibility equal to innovation. Any company that’s proactive toward AI ethics will protect its reputation and guarantee its competitiveness in the market. One may ask, what about the workforce? We must reform employee training, integrating technical knowledge with ethics. For instance, AI education initiatives should include real-world use case studies, scenario-based learning, and iterated discussion on bias, security, and accountability. This helps teams stay current and properly positioned to unpack AI’s ethical complexities as the technology continues to evolve. Given AI’s wide-reaching impact, leaders need to cooperate across borders to establish uniform guidelines and policies that guarantee its responsible usage. Proposals such as the EU’s AI Act and the Hiroshima G7 AI Process are important precedents, but they underscore the need for aligning differing approaches to AI policy and oversight. Hence, to shape AI’s future, future CEOs and industry leaders should participate in these conversations responsibly. CEOs must step up now In conclusion, we should remember that demanding ethics in AI leadership isn’t about stifling innovation. Instead, it’s a means of steering innovation in a way that AI enhances humans, not overpowers them. As indicated earlier, a company that fails to build responsibility into its AI strategy sacrifices its security, brand reputation, and business’s long-term viability. Excerpts from the NTT DATA report, ‘The AI Responsibility Gap: Why Leadership Is the Missing Link.’ Source: NTT DATA Without firm leadership, AI’s risks could outweigh its advantages. Therefore, business leaders have to acknowledge their part in determining its trajectory. Their decisions today dictate whether the technology will drive sustainable progress or be a source of unintended challenges tomorrow. The reality is we are on the cusp of an AI-powered future. So, we must ask ourselves whether we are building that future on ethics or leaving it to chance. CEOs actively embedding responsibility across their AI strategies, fostering collaboration, and prioritizing governance are forerunners to a future where AI is a force for good. It’s time to provide leadership in responsibility.

title: XRP Will Tokenize Bitcoin On XRPL, Crypto Proponent Claims
body: The digital asset community is actively discussing a recent claim by crypto enthusiast KingValex, who proposed that Bitcoin might be tokenized on the XRP Ledger (XRPL). In a recent post, he stated, “$XRP is going to tokenize BITCOIN on the XRPL & that’s the answer to the BTC people.” This assertion has sparked discussions on the potential implications of such a development, including its impact on market dynamics and XRP’s valuation. $XRP is going to tokenize BITCOIN on the XRPL & that’s the answer to the BTC people . Like I said YEARS ago before people caught on YEARS LATER. — KINGVALEX (@VALELORDX) February 23, 2025 Understanding the Concept of Bitcoin Tokenization on XRPL Tokenization involves representing a real-world or digital asset on a blockchain, allowing it to be transacted more efficiently. In this context, if Bitcoin were tokenized on the XRPL, it would mean a version of BTC operating within the XRPL ecosystem. This could bring Bitcoin’s liquidity and store-of-value properties into an environment known for fast and low-cost transactions. The XRPL is designed for speed, scalability, and efficiency. These make it a compelling alternative to Bitcoin’s proof-of-work mechanism, which is often criticized for slow transaction speeds and high fees. By integrating Bitcoin into the XRPL, users could transact with a Bitcoin-backed asset while benefiting from the ledger’s efficiency. Community Reactions and Market Speculations The claim by KingValex has led to a broader discussion within the XRP community, with some users questioning whether this development could finally impact XRP’s price. One user, @BThomasBThomas, asked whether Bitcoin’s tokenization would result in XRP breaking free from what many perceive as long-term price suppression. He asked, “Is there any possibility that even with this BTC tokenization on the XRPL, the price of XRP keeps being dirty cheap?! Or that manipulation sooner or later will end!?” This concern reflects a common sentiment in the XRP community—despite its adoption and technological advantages, XRP has historically struggled to maintain sustained price increases. According to some analysts, market forces, regulatory uncertainties, and broader crypto market trends have helped keep XRP’s price in check. Another user, Zak Khan, pointed out historical price movements, suggesting that XRP tends to move in rapid upward surges followed by extended consolidation periods. He stated , “XRP’s price moves just like how it did from 60 cents to new ATH. Very fast. Then it’s long sideways and a little down here and there. It’s always been like that.” We are on twitter, follow us to connect with us :- @TimesTabloid1 — TimesTabloid (@TimesTabloid1) July 15, 2023 Meanwhile, Justin Tomlin emphasized that an increased demand, driven by Bitcoin’s potential tokenization on XRPL, would necessitate a price reevaluation. He remarked , “The price will need to be reevaluated to match the demand, based on the utility and because BTC doesn’t do [anything] other than be expensive and slow.” Evaluating the Feasibility and Potential Impact While the claim of Bitcoin tokenization on XRPL is intriguing, its feasibility remains uncertain. There has been no official confirmation from Ripple or XRPL developers regarding such an initiative. However, given that XRPL already supports the tokenization of assets through its built-in decentralized exchange (DEX), a tokenized version of Bitcoin is technically possible. If implemented, this could enhance interoperability between Bitcoin and XRPL, increasing liquidity and possibly driving more adoption. However, whether this would directly influence XRP’s price is debatable. Market trends suggest utility does not always correlate with immediate price appreciation, as seen with several blockchain projects that have achieved technological advancements without substantial price gains. Disclaimer : This content is meant to inform and should not be considered financial advice. Readers are urged to do in-depth research before making any investment decisions. Any action taken by the reader is strictly at their own risk. Times Tabloid is not responsible for any financial losses. title: Cardano Price Prediction: Demand for Panshibi (SHIBI) Skyrockets as Binance Approvals Could Happen

With a crucial resistance zone close to $0.82, ADA is currently trading at about $0.74 . Bulls may burst out toward $0.85 if they can regain this level. Nonetheless, momentum metrics like the RSI, which is positioned below 50, indicate that purchasing pressure is still mild. A move above $0.85 would spark fresh interest, but if buying pressure doesn't hold, ADA might retest support at $0.55 or below. title: Why Bitcoin is Crashing Today?
body: The post Why Bitcoin is Crashing Today? appeared first on Coinpedia Fintech News The cryptocurrency market has crashed over 5% overnight with a trading volume of $144.82 billion. With this, the crypto-verse is now valued at $3.01 Trillion. Notably, the market has wiped out over $110 billion in 24 hours, making it the worst-performing day of the year. Considering the ongoing market statistics, is this a good time to invest in Bitcoin? Moreover, investors are storming the internet with questions like “Why is BTC crashing?” In this article, we have uncovered the market sentiments and possible short-term Bitcoin price analysis just for you. BTC Price Breaks Below Its Crucial Support Of $90,000! The price of Bitcoin has lost 7.16% in 24 hours with a trading volume of $74.79 billion, a change of +206.03%. Furthermore, it has dropped ~8% in 7 days and ~15% in the last 30 days. With a YTD return of -4.68%, its dominance has increased to 61.1079%. The EMA 50-day constantly acts as a resistance to the Bitcoin price chart in the daily time frame with its EMA 200-day on the verge of experiencing a negative crossover. This highlights an increase in the selling-over-buying pressure for the largest crypto token. Moreover, the Relative Strength Index (RSI) records a sharp plunge toward the oversold range in the 1D time frame. Moreover, the average trendline displays a similar price trend, suggesting a negative outlook for the BTC price this week. How Low Will Bitcoin Price Go? If the bears maintain the negative momentum, the Bitcoin price could retest its support level of $85k. Maintaining the price below that level could set the stage for it to plunge toward its lower support price of $81,000 in the upcoming time. However, if the bulls outrun the bears, the BTC price may retest its immediate resistance level of $90,000. Moreover, if the bulls dominate the market, this could result in the largest crypto token heading toward its upper resistance level of $92,000. Are you one of many who are wondering what’s next for BTC price amid the ongoing market turmoil? Read CoinPedia’s latest Bitcoin Price Prediction today to uncover the possible long-term puzzles! FAQs Why is the Bitcoin price falling? Amid the ongoing tariff war, the global market has experienced a major setback, resulting in the BTC price losing its value. How much will 1 Bitcoin be worth in 2025? Considering an optimistic situation, the price of BTC token could reach a maximum trading value of $160,000 this year. How much is Bitcoin worth? Built on Sei’s high-performance blockchain, ForU AI allows users to create and co-own AI Agents that can engage in community management, liquidity facilitation, DAO governance, and more—all while ensuring users are fairly compensated. Introducing ForU AI—An Innovative Platform Pioneering AI Agents and RWAI ForU AI pays users for being themselves, and with secure logins, proof of humanity tech, and bot-free zones, it aims to monetize and consolidate your digital life. The partnership with Sei Ecosystem will leverage Edge AI, Web3, and blockchain technology, setting new standards for the industry. Backed by Leading Investors ForU AI is committed to reshaping the digital ownership and data markets, and has, not surprisingly, received huge support from some of the leading investors like IBC Group and other notable angel investors. It is bridging the gap between Web2 accessibility with the disruptive powers of Web3. It is taking great steps to revolutionize the AI and data industry.With blockchain security and privacy, ForU AI is delivering a genuinely secure, transparent, easy-to-navigate, and rewarding data marketplace. “ForU AI is contributing to the development of AI Agents within the Sei ecosystem, offering new ways to enhance engagement and innovation in decentralized environments,” said Lee Zhu, Strategic Partnership Lead at Sei Foundation. “Their approach to Community AI-DiDs and AI Agents introduces novel mechanisms for leveraging data in Web3 projects, and we look forward to seeing its impact unfold.” Lee Zhu, Strategic Partnerships Lead at Sei Foundation

title: Groundbreaking Nasdaq Listing: Grayscale Polkadot Trust to Unlock New Crypto Investment Horizons
body: Get ready for a potential game-changer in the world of cryptocurrency investments! Whispers from BWEnews on Telegram suggest that Grayscale Investments is making a bold move to list its Polkadot Trust on Nasdaq. This exciting development could open up new avenues for investors seeking exposure to Polkadot (DOT) through traditional financial markets. Let’s dive into what this groundbreaking news means for the crypto sphere and you. What is the Buzz About the Grayscale Polkadot Trust and Nasdaq Listing? The core of the excitement revolves around a proposed rule change filing submitted to Nasdaq. This filing, under Nasdaq Rule 5711(D), signals Grayscale’s intent to list and trade shares of its Polkadot Trust on the Nasdaq exchange. For those unfamiliar, Grayscale Investments is a titan in the digital asset management space, renowned for its crypto trusts that allow investors to gain exposure to cryptocurrencies in the form of publicly traded securities. Their Bitcoin Trust (GBTC) is perhaps the most well-known example. Now, they’re setting their sights on Polkadot (DOT), a highly regarded blockchain platform known for its interoperability and scalability. Listing the Grayscale Polkadot Trust on Nasdaq would be a significant step, potentially making DOT more accessible to a broader range of investors, including institutional players who may prefer the regulated environment of a traditional stock exchange. Why is a Nasdaq Listing a Big Deal for the Polkadot Trust? Listing on Nasdaq isn’t just a formality; it’s a powerful validation and offers numerous benefits: Increased Accessibility: Currently, investing in the Grayscale Polkadot Trust might involve navigating specific platforms or custodial solutions. A Nasdaq listing would simplify access, allowing investors to buy and sell shares through their regular brokerage accounts, just like any other stock or ETF. Enhanced Liquidity: Being traded on a major exchange like Nasdaq typically leads to greater trading volume and tighter bid-ask spreads, making it easier for investors to enter and exit positions in the Polkadot Trust . Institutional Adoption: Many institutional investors have mandates or preferences for investing in securities listed on recognized exchanges. A Nasdaq listing could pave the way for increased institutional capital to flow into Polkadot through the Grayscale Trust. Legitimacy and Trust: Listing on Nasdaq adds a layer of regulatory oversight and legitimacy, which can boost investor confidence in the digital assets represented by the Trust. It signals a level of maturity and acceptance within mainstream finance. Wider Investor Base: Beyond institutions, a Nasdaq listing opens the door to retail investors who may be more comfortable investing in familiar exchange-traded products rather than directly holding DOT or navigating the complexities of cryptocurrency exchanges. Benefits of Investing in Digital Assets through a Trust Structure Grayscale’s trust structure offers a unique approach to crypto investment . Here’s why it’s appealing to many investors: Benefit Description Simplified Exposure Investors gain exposure to Polkadot without needing to directly purchase, store, or manage DOT tokens themselves. Grayscale handles the custody and security. Tax Advantages (Potentially) Depending on jurisdiction and individual circumstances, investing through a trust structure can offer certain tax efficiencies compared to direct crypto ownership. Consult with a tax advisor for personalized guidance. Familiar Investment Vehicle Trusts are a well-established investment structure, familiar to many investors comfortable with traditional financial products. This can lower the barrier to entry for those hesitant about the complexities of crypto wallets and exchanges. Regulated Environment While cryptocurrencies themselves are often subject to evolving regulations, Grayscale Trusts operate within a more regulated framework, providing a degree of investor protection and transparency. Potential Challenges and Considerations While the prospect of a Grayscale Polkadot Trust listing on Nasdaq is exciting, it’s essential to consider potential challenges and points to keep in mind: Regulatory Approval: The proposed rule change needs to be approved by the relevant regulatory bodies. While there’s optimism, regulatory processes can be unpredictable. Premium/Discount: Grayscale Trusts have historically traded at premiums or discounts to the Net Asset Value (NAV) of the underlying cryptocurrency holdings. Market demand and supply dynamics can influence this, potentially impacting investor returns. Fees: Grayscale charges management fees for its Trusts, which investors should factor into their investment decisions. These fees are for the convenience and management provided by Grayscale. Market Volatility: Polkadot, like all cryptocurrencies, is subject to significant price volatility. Investing in the Grayscale Polkadot Trust still exposes investors to this inherent market risk. Tracking Error: The Trust’s performance may not perfectly mirror the price movements of DOT due to factors like fees, operational costs, and the premium/discount dynamics. Actionable Insights for Crypto Investors So, what should you do with this information? Stay Informed: Keep an eye on official announcements from Grayscale and Nasdaq regarding the rule change filing and any updates on the listing process. Reputable crypto news sources will provide ongoing coverage. Do Your Research on Polkadot (DOT): If you’re considering investing in the Polkadot Trust , deepen your understanding of Polkadot’s technology, ecosystem, use cases, and long-term potential. Assess Your Risk Tolerance: Cryptocurrency investments are inherently risky. Evaluate your own risk appetite and investment goals before allocating capital to the Grayscale Polkadot Trust or any other crypto asset. Consult a Financial Advisor: If you’re unsure whether this investment is right for you, seek professional advice from a qualified financial advisor who can assess your individual circumstances and provide personalized guidance. Consider Diversification: Never put all your eggs in one basket. Diversification across different asset classes and cryptocurrencies is a prudent investment strategy to mitigate risk. The Future of Crypto Investment and Nasdaq Grayscale’s move to list the Polkadot Trust on Nasdaq is a powerful indicator of the growing convergence between traditional finance and the cryptocurrency world. It signifies increasing acceptance and demand for digital assets within mainstream investment channels. If successful, this listing could pave the way for more crypto-based investment products to find their way onto major exchanges like Nasdaq, further bridging the gap between the old and new financial paradigms. This development underscores the transformative potential of blockchain technology and cryptocurrencies. As regulatory frameworks evolve and institutional adoption accelerates, we can expect to see even more innovative and accessible ways for investors to participate in the exciting world of crypto investment . Conclusion: A Groundbreaking Step for Polkadot and Crypto The potential Nasdaq listing of the Grayscale Polkadot Trust is undoubtedly groundbreaking news for both Polkadot and the broader cryptocurrency market. It represents a significant step towards mainstream acceptance, increased accessibility, and greater institutional participation in the digital asset space. While challenges and considerations remain, the overall outlook is optimistic. This move could unlock new opportunities for investors and further solidify Polkadot’s position as a leading blockchain platform. To learn more about the latest crypto market trends, explore our article on key developments shaping Bitcoin institutional adoption.

title: Unleashed: Google’s Free AI Coding Assistant Gemini Code Assist Blows Away GitHub Copilot with Massive Usage
body: In a move that’s sending shockwaves through the developer community, Google has just dropped a game-changer: a completely free AI coding assistant called Gemini Code Assist for Individuals. This isn’t just another AI tool; it’s a powerful offering designed to supercharge your coding workflow without breaking the bank. For cryptocurrency developers and tech enthusiasts constantly seeking efficiency and innovation, this announcement is huge. Imagine having the power of Google’s Gemini AI model at your fingertips, helping you write cleaner, faster, and more robust code, absolutely free. Let’s dive into what makes this free AI coding tool a potential revolution in the developer landscape. What is Google Gemini Code Assist and Why Should You Care? Google’s Gemini Code Assist for Individuals is a newly launched, free version of their AI-powered coding assistance tool. It’s designed to help developers of all levels write code more efficiently and effectively. Think of it as your intelligent coding partner, ready to assist you within your favorite coding environments. But what exactly does it do, and why should you, especially as someone in the fast-paced world of crypto and blockchain development, be excited? Intelligent Code Completion: Gemini Code Assist can predict and complete lines of code, saving you countless keystrokes and reducing the chances of errors. This is crucial when dealing with complex smart contracts or intricate blockchain logic. Bug Fixing and Code Explanation: Struggling with a pesky bug? Gemini Code Assist can help identify and fix errors in your code. Confused about a particular section of code? It can explain it in plain English, making even the most convoluted codebases understandable. Natural Language Interaction: You can chat with Gemini Code Assist in natural language. Just ask it to write a function, debug a section of code, or explain a concept, and it will respond intelligently and helpfully. Integration with Popular IDEs: Gemini Code Assist seamlessly integrates with popular coding environments like VS Code and JetBrains, meaning you can start using it right away within your existing workflow. Support for Multiple Languages: Whether you’re coding in Python, JavaScript, Go, or any other popular language, Gemini Code Assist has you covered. Essentially, Google is offering a powerful developer tool that aims to democratize access to AI-powered coding assistance, making it available to everyone, not just enterprise clients. Gemini Code Assist vs. GitHub Copilot: A Free Tier Showdown The elephant in the room is GitHub Copilot, Microsoft’s widely popular AI coding assistant. Google is directly challenging Copilot with Gemini Code Assist, and they’re doing it in a big way by offering a significantly more generous free tier. Let’s break down the key differences in their free offerings: Feature Gemini Code Assist for Individuals (Free) GitHub Copilot (Free Tier) Code Completions per Month 180,000 2,000 Chat Requests per Day 240 ~50 (estimated based on 5x lower than Gemini) Context Window 128,000 tokens ~32,000 tokens (estimated, based on 4x smaller) Cost Free Free Tier Limited As you can see, the numbers are staggering. Google’s Gemini Code Assist offers 90 times more code completions and nearly 5 times more chat requests than the free GitHub Copilot plan. Furthermore, the massive 128,000-token context window means Gemini can understand and reason over much larger and more complex codebases, leading to more accurate and relevant suggestions. This is a significant advantage, especially when working on intricate blockchain projects. Why Such High Usage Caps? Google’s Strategy Explained Why is Google being so generous with the free tier of Gemini Code Assist ? According to Ryan Salva, Google’s head of developer tooling (and former GitHub Copilot team lead), the strategy is to attract developers early in their careers. By offering a powerful and free tool with incredibly high usage limits, Google hopes to onboard a new generation of developers onto the Gemini Code Assist platform. The long-term plan is to convert some of these free users into paying enterprise customers down the line. In an interview with Bitcoin World, Salva emphasized that this free offering is a strategic move to build a strong user base and establish Gemini Code Assist as the go-to AI coding assistant for developers worldwide. It’s a classic “freemium” model, but with an exceptionally generous free tier designed to disrupt the market and challenge Microsoft’s dominance in the developer tools space. How to Get Started with Gemini Code Assist for Individuals Ready to experience the power of Gemini Code Assist for yourself? Getting started is simple: Sign up for the free public preview: Head over to the Gemini Code Assist website and sign up for the free public preview. Install the plugin: Install the Gemini Code Assist plugin for your preferred IDE (VS Code or JetBrains). Start coding: Begin coding as usual, and Gemini Code Assist will be there to assist you with code completions, bug fixes, and explanations. It’s that easy! Within minutes, you can have a powerful free AI coding tool integrated into your development environment, ready to boost your productivity and code quality. The Future of AI-Powered Development is Here Google’s launch of Gemini Code Assist for Individuals is a clear signal that AI coding assistants are not just a trend, but a fundamental shift in how software is developed. By offering a free and incredibly powerful tool, Google is lowering the barrier to entry for AI-assisted coding and empowering developers of all backgrounds to leverage the power of artificial intelligence. For the cryptocurrency and blockchain space, this means faster development cycles, fewer bugs in smart contracts, and more time to focus on innovation and building the future of decentralized technologies. To learn more about the latest AI market trends, explore our article on key developments shaping AI features.

title: Babylon Airdrop Details: What Will Be BABY Token Price At Launch?
body: Babylon Foundation, the infra project empowering the Web3 space, has announced its official Baby token launch with many key details. These events come amid the launch of the first Bitcoin Secured Network (BSN), the Babylon Genesis, which will enhance, secure, and provide liquidity to the broader blockchain ecosystem. With a recent announcement, the web3 project has opened a registration window and revealed the Babylon airdrop details. Let’s see the key details and the possible BABY token price at launch. Babylon Airdrop Details Out: Who’s Eligible? After much anticipation and the Babylon Off-Phase 2 launch in the previous month, the airdrop details are out. According to the Babylon Foundation announcement, this token distribution event is primarily aimed at the early adopter and contributors to the network. Additionally, there are particular eligibility criteria, where each category has different terms and conditions. For example, the Phase 1 stakers who staked during Phase 1 (up to BTC block height 875087) are eligible. In the Pioneer Pass NFT holders, the early stakers who hold the Pioneer Pass NFTs and staked during Phase 1 are also eligible. In addition, Phase 1 Finality providers (Babylon Github registered users + delegations during Phase 1), developers who contributed to the open source project, and social media contributors (who engaged before February 18, 2025) are included. Interestingly, other special airdrops from them exist, such as Binance Earn participants and wallet-specific captains. Interested candidates can check more details on the official Babylon Foundation page. How to Register for the Babylon Airdrop? The Babylon airdrop window opened from February 25, 2025, at 8:00 AM UTC until March 15, 2025, at 8:00 AM UTC. During this time, the user will create their BABY address and cryptographically link it to their significant BTC wallet, which they can use for stalking, airdrop receiving, and other tasks. The BABY token airdrop registration process requires Web users to create the BABY address and visit the airdrop.babylon.foundation. Once the address is created, users must provide their BTC address (for staking), Polygon address (for NFTs), and/or GitHub account. The last is signing the required cryptographic proofs of possession to complete registration. Similarly, CLI users must refer to the CLI guide and generate cryptographic proof, such as their BTC public key, Polygon address, and finality provider public key. The last step is to submit the registration using the Babylon API. As excitement builds around the airdrop, the question arises of what the BABY token’s price will be at launch and how it will perform. BABY Token Price at Launch: Market Expectations Speculation about the BABY token’s value began growing after the February 25, 2025, TGE announcement. According to the Uniswap pre-trading market, investors’ excitement pumped the BABY/ BTC trading pair. Its trading volume surged 5% within 15 minutes of the announcement. Interestingly, the impact was also visible in the Babylon token price, which surged 3%. Similarly, Binance trading activity surged, and the BABY/ USDT price increased by 2.5%. With that, investors’ expectations for this token’s launch are higher. However, the BABY token’s launch price is uncertain due to missing tokenomics and other relevant details. Investors must await further information on the subject before anticipating anything. What’s In There For You? The new updates confirm that the Babylon TGE and one of the biggest crypto airdrops is just around the corner. The web3 project airdrop registration has begun today and will continue until March 15, 2025. Once this is over, the must-awaited Baby token launch will take place, with rewards for early stakers, finality providers, NFT holders, GitHub contributors, and social campaign registration. However, the BABY token price at launch is uncertain. Investors must await further updates. The post Babylon Airdrop Details: What Will Be BABY Token Price At Launch? appeared first on CoinGape .

title: Danger Signals: Market Caution Grips Crypto as Trump’s Tariff Threats Loom
body: Cryptocurrency markets, often seen as detached from traditional finance, are feeling the chill of global economic winds. As former President Trump reiterates his stance on tariffs, a wave of market caution is sweeping across asset classes, and digital currencies are no exception. Are we on the brink of another trade war, and what does it mean for your crypto portfolio? Let’s dive into the unfolding situation and understand the potential ripple effects. Why is Market Caution Gripping Global Assets Amid Tariff Threats? The mere mention of tariffs can send shivers down the spines of investors. Why? Because tariffs – taxes on imported goods – are more than just trade policy; they’re economic disruptors. When a major economy like the United States threatens to impose or increase tariffs, it sets off a chain reaction: Increased Costs for Businesses: Tariffs directly raise the price of imported components and goods. This squeezes profit margins for companies that rely on international supply chains, forcing them to either absorb costs or pass them on to consumers through higher prices, fueling inflation. Retaliatory Tariffs: Trade is a two-way street. When one country imposes tariffs, affected nations often retaliate with their own tariffs. This tit-for-tat escalation can lead to a full-blown trade war, disrupting global trade flows and hurting businesses on all sides. Economic Uncertainty: Tariff threats inject significant economic uncertainty into the market. Businesses become hesitant to invest and expand, fearing unpredictable cost increases and reduced consumer demand. This uncertainty can stifle economic growth and lead to market volatility. Impact on Global Growth: Global trade is a significant engine of economic growth. Trade wars and tariff barriers can significantly slow down this engine, impacting global GDP growth and creating a less favorable environment for investments across the board, including in nascent markets like cryptocurrencies. For the cryptocurrency market, which often seeks to position itself as an alternative to traditional finance, this global market caution can manifest in complex ways. While some might see crypto as a safe haven during economic turmoil, others become risk-averse and pull back from all volatile assets. The Specter of Trade War: A Looming Danger for Crypto? The term “trade war” itself evokes images of economic conflict and instability. Is this an overreaction? Perhaps not. Here’s why the renewed discussion around tariff threats is being taken so seriously: Historical Context: The previous US administration under Donald Trump saw a period of aggressive tariff imposition, primarily targeting China. This period was marked by increased market volatility and anxieties about global economic slowdown. The current resurgence of similar rhetoric brings back those memories and fears. Geopolitical Tensions: Tariff threats are often intertwined with broader geopolitical strategies. They can be used as leverage in negotiations, or as a tool to reshape global power dynamics. This adds another layer of complexity and unpredictability, making markets even more jittery. Impact on Supply Chains: Years after the initial disruptions caused by the pandemic, global supply chains are still in a state of flux. New tariffs could further complicate these chains, leading to bottlenecks, delays, and increased costs. This can have a cascading effect across industries and economies. How Does Market Caution Translate to Crypto Markets? While the direct link between tariff threats and cryptocurrency prices might not always be immediately apparent, the underlying mechanisms are quite real: Risk-Off Sentiment: When traditional markets exhibit market caution due to geopolitical or economic uncertainty, a “risk-off” sentiment often prevails. Investors tend to move away from perceived riskier assets towards safer havens like government bonds or cash. Cryptocurrencies, still considered a higher-risk asset class by many, can experience outflows during these periods. Correlation with Traditional Markets: The correlation between cryptocurrency markets and traditional markets, particularly equities, has been observed to increase during times of stress. If stock markets decline due to tariff threats and broader economic anxieties, crypto markets can follow suit, at least in the short term. Impact on Institutional Investment: Institutional investors, who are increasingly important players in the crypto space, are highly sensitive to macroeconomic factors and global economic uncertainty . Heightened tariff tensions and trade war fears could make them more hesitant to allocate capital to crypto, or even lead to a reduction in existing allocations. Currency Fluctuations: Tariffs and trade disputes can trigger fluctuations in currency exchange rates. While some might argue that cryptocurrencies offer a hedge against currency devaluation, periods of intense market volatility can lead to unpredictable price swings in both fiat and crypto markets. Navigating the Uncertainty: Actionable Insights for Crypto Investors So, what should crypto investors do amidst this climate of market caution fueled by tariff threats ? Here are some actionable insights: Stay Informed: Keep a close watch on developments related to trade policy and global economic indicators. Reliable news sources and economic analysis can help you understand the evolving situation and its potential impact on markets. Diversify Your Portfolio: Diversification is a fundamental principle of risk management. Ensure your crypto portfolio is well-diversified across different types of cryptocurrencies and asset classes. Consider holding a mix of established cryptocurrencies, promising altcoins, and potentially even some traditional assets to mitigate risk. Manage Your Risk Exposure: Assess your risk tolerance and adjust your portfolio accordingly. If you are risk-averse, consider reducing your exposure to more volatile assets, including cryptocurrencies, during periods of heightened uncertainty. Focus on Long-Term Fundamentals: While short-term market fluctuations can be unsettling, remember to focus on the long-term fundamentals of the cryptocurrency market. The underlying technology, adoption trends, and use cases of cryptocurrencies remain compelling. Market downturns can sometimes present opportunities to accumulate fundamentally strong assets at discounted prices. Consider Dollar-Cost Averaging (DCA): In volatile markets, DCA can be a prudent strategy. Instead of trying to time the market, invest a fixed amount of money at regular intervals. This can help to smooth out your entry price and reduce the risk of buying high. The Global Market Puzzle: Tariffs and Beyond It’s crucial to remember that tariff threats are just one piece of the complex global economic puzzle. Other factors are also at play, including: Factor Potential Impact Inflation and Interest Rates Persistent inflation and rising interest rates can dampen economic growth and increase borrowing costs, impacting all asset classes. Geopolitical Instability Conflicts and geopolitical tensions in various regions can create market volatility and uncertainty. Technological Disruption Rapid technological advancements, particularly in areas like AI and blockchain, can reshape industries and create both opportunities and risks. Regulatory Landscape for Crypto Evolving regulations for cryptocurrencies around the world can significantly impact market sentiment and adoption. Understanding these interconnected factors is essential for navigating the current market environment and making informed investment decisions. Conclusion: Navigating the Cautious Currents The resurgence of tariff threats has injected a dose of market caution into global financial markets, and cryptocurrencies are not immune. While the long-term trajectory of the crypto market remains promising, short-term volatility and uncertainty are likely to persist. By staying informed, managing risk, and focusing on long-term fundamentals, crypto investors can navigate these cautious currents and position themselves for future opportunities. The key is to approach the market with awareness and resilience, understanding that in the world of global finance, ripples from trade policy can reach even the digital shores of cryptocurrency. To learn more about the latest Forex market trends, explore our article on key developments shaping US Dollar liquidity.
tags: Forex News|economic uncertainty|global markets|market caution|tariff threats|Trade War

title: Bitflow Launches New DCA Tool to Automate Bitcoin DeFi Investing
body: In a big move for the Bitcoin DeFi Automation wait, Bitflow, a decentralized Bitcoin exchange, announced today the launch of an Automated Dollar-Cost Averaging (DCA) feature on the Stacks blockchain. This tool will enable users to automate recurring purchases of Bitcoin (BTC) and Runes tokens, facilitating trustless and non-custodial investment strategies. How Bitflow’s DCA tool will automate trading on Bitcoin DeFi Dollar-Cost Averaging (DCA) is a well-established investment strategy where an investor systematically purchases a fixed dollar amount of an asset at regular intervals, regardless of price fluctuations. This method helps mitigate the impact of volatility and reduces the risk of making large investments at peak prices. With Bitflow’s newly launched tool, users will be able to now automate this process within the DeFi ecosystem, ensuring disciplined and consistent accumulation of Bitcoin without manual intervention. Bitflow’s DCA tool is integrated with the Stacks blockchain, a layer-2 solution designed to bring smart contract functionality to Bitcoin. This integration enables users to schedule automated Bitcoin and Runes purchases using a decentralized and non-custodial framework, eliminating the need for third-party intermediaries. Introducing Dollar-Cost Averaging (DCA) on Bitflow! You can now automate a disciplined strategy that smooths out market fluctuations, making your investment journey simpler, more methodical, profitable, and stress free! 1/9 pic.twitter.com/gZ1e99KhRi — Bitflow (@Bitflow_Finance) February 24, 2025 A Big Move for Bitcoin DeFi? While DeFi has flourished on Ethereum and other smart contract-enabled blockchains, Bitcoin has historically been limited in its DeFi capabilities due to its script restrictions. However, with the rise of layer-2 solutions like Stacks and the increasing adoption of Bitcoin-native DeFi platforms, new opportunities are emerging. Bitflow’s automated DCA tool aligns with this trend by providing a much-needed feature for long-term investors who prefer a structured, passive strategy for accumulating Bitcoin. The tool caters to both retail investors and institutional players looking for automated exposure to BTC and Runes without relying on centralized exchanges. How will it help Traders and Investors The introduction of automated DCA investing within the Bitcoin DeFi ecosystem could significantly impact investor behavior. Bitflow’s DCA tool will provide a convenient method for users to dollar-cost average into BTC without manually placing trades, which could lead to increased long-term holding and reduced market volatility. Additionally, Bitflow has hinted at future enhancements, including AI-powered portfolio optimization, multi-chain interoperability, and ad further position Bitflow as a leading innovator in Bitcoin DeFi automation. Thus, as the DeFi landscape continues to evolve, tools like these can play a crucial role in onboarding more users into the world of decentralized finance while enhancing the accessibility and efficiency of Bitcoin investing. With increased demand for automated solutions and institutional interest in Bitcoin growing, Bitflow’s latest innovation is poised to drive further adoption of decentralized investing strategies. It will also help in making Bitcoin DeFi more user-friendly and efficient than ever before. The post Bitflow Launches New DCA Tool to Automate Bitcoin DeFi Investing appeared first on CoinGape .

title: Revolutionize Hiring: Perfect AI Taps $23M to Fix Recruitment Flaws
body: The buzz around “Agentic AI” is deafening, and for good reason. Developers are scrambling to harness its power, creating apps that promise to make generative AI practical and impactful across industries. Investors are equally eager, pouring funds into the most promising ventures. In a powerful example of this trend, Perfect AI, an Israeli startup focused on transforming recruitment, has just secured a significant $23 million in seed funding. This isn’t just another funding round; it’s a clear signal that the future of hiring is being rewritten by AI. Perfect AI aims to be the ultimate co-pilot for recruitment teams, streamlining everything from crafting compelling job descriptions to pinpointing the perfect candidates from a flood of applications. They’re not just playing in the same field as established players like Indeed, Recruiter, and LinkedIn; they’re aiming to redefine it. Imagine recruiters reclaiming up to 25 hours each week – that’s the kind of impact Perfect AI is promising. In just a year since its quiet launch, Perfect AI has expanded its reach from a mere 20 to an impressive 200 businesses, including names like Fiverr, eToro, McCann, and Coralogix. This rapid growth underscores the urgent need for innovation in the often-cumbersome world of recruitment. What Makes Perfect AI the Perfect Solution for Recruitment AI? Perfect AI’s origin story is as intriguing as its mission. Founded by Eylon Etshtein, known for his controversial facial recognition startup Anyvision, Perfect AI emerged from Etshtein’s firsthand experience with the pain points of scaling recruitment. At Anyvision, Etshtein was deeply involved in hiring, quickly realizing that traditional methods simply wouldn’t scale. His background in AI, particularly in “needle-in-a-haystack” problem-solving, sparked the vision for a platform that could intelligently identify ideal candidates. This vision took shape as Perfect AI, born from the challenges Etshtein faced while building Anyvision. Stepping back from his day-to-day role at Anyvision, Etshtein channeled his expertise into creating a solution for a problem he knew intimately: the inefficiencies of recruitment. While the market is brimming with AI-powered HR startups, Perfect AI and its investors are confident in its unique approach. What sets Perfect AI apart in the competitive landscape of AI Recruitment ? Built from the Ground Up: Unlike many competitors leveraging third-party Large Language Models (LLMs), Perfect AI has constructed its platform from scratch. This includes developing its own vector data set and training it with meticulously curated data from third-party providers. Pre-ChatGPT Vision: Etshtein emphasizes that Perfect AI’s development predates the ChatGPT boom. Their focus was on creating a sophisticated “career trajectory algorithm” capable of understanding a candidate’s past, present, and future potential – a capability that wasn’t readily available with off-the-shelf LLMs at the time. Handling Large Payloads Efficiently: Perfect AI is designed to excel where LLMs falter – in processing large “payloads” of data. In recruitment terms, this translates to analyzing up to 50 data points per candidate, annotated and organized to generate meaningful insights. This deep dive into candidate data is crucial for accurate and effective matching. Proprietary Data Advantage: Perfect AI relies on proprietary, annotated data to ensure the accuracy of its results. Etshtein explains that they source data from major recruitment businesses, meticulously “clean” it, and then repurpose it to train their algorithms. This focus on data quality is a cornerstone of their platform’s effectiveness. Funding Fuels the Future of Agentic AI in Hiring The $23 million funding isn’t just a single injection; it’s structured in two phases. Perfect AI secured an initial equity investment of approximately $12 million a year ago from prominent investors including Target Global, RTP Global, and Pitango. More recently, they received a SAFE note (Simple Agreement for Future Equity) from Hanaco Ventures, Joule Ventures, and Young Sohn, former president of Samsung and Arm board member. This structure highlights the sustained confidence in Perfect AI’s vision and execution. Lior Prosor, a partner at Hanaco Ventures, underscores the industry’s need for genuine innovation, stating, “In an industry desperate for true innovation… Perfect is utilizing proprietary data sets, and integrating into industry-specific workflows to completely transform how recruitment operates.” This investment validates Perfect AI’s approach and its potential to revolutionize how businesses find and hire talent through Agentic AI . Addressing the Core Flaws in Traditional Recruitment with AI Job Search The recruitment sector is ripe for disruption. It’s plagued by inefficiencies that impact both recruiters and job seekers. Consider these common challenges that AI Job Search platforms like Perfect AI are designed to solve: Challenge Description Perfect AI’s Solution Applicant Overload Popular jobs or companies can receive an overwhelming number of applications, making it difficult to identify qualified candidates. Perfect AI helps recruiters sift through applications, identifying the most relevant candidates efficiently. Finding Niche Talent For specialized roles or less popular companies, attracting a sufficient pool of qualified applicants can be a major hurdle. Perfect AI expands the reach of job postings and proactively identifies potential candidates who might not actively be applying. Time-Consuming Manual Processes Traditional recruitment involves numerous manual tasks, from writing job descriptions to screening resumes, consuming valuable recruiter time. Perfect AI automates many of these tasks, freeing up recruiters to focus on strategic initiatives and candidate engagement. Bias in Hiring Unintentional biases can creep into manual screening processes, leading to unfair or non-optimal hiring decisions. AI, when properly trained and monitored, can help mitigate certain biases and promote more objective candidate evaluation. Perfect AI isn’t alone in the quest to transform recruitment. The landscape includes established giants like LinkedIn, which has integrated AI tools into its platform, as well as innovative startups like HiBob, Workable, Maki, Mercor, Tezi, and SeekOut. However, Perfect AI’s focus on proprietary technology and a ground-up approach positions it as a distinct player in this dynamic market. The next phase for Perfect AI involves enhancing its suite of tools for recruiters. Significantly, they are also planning to launch a free tool for job seekers, empowering candidates to refine their AI Job Search strategies. This dual focus on both recruiters and candidates could provide Perfect AI with a valuable competitive edge and a rich source of data for future innovations in Recruitment AI . To learn more about the latest AI market trends, explore our article on key developments shaping AI features.

title: Could XRP Price Hit $1,000 if Elon Uses Ripple for US National Debt Repayment?
body: Speculation is rife about whether XRP price could rally to $1,000 if Elon Musk and President Donald Trump tapped the Ripple network as the blockchain of choice for US national debt repayment. Given Musk’s history with the crypto markets after Tesla’s Bitcoin adoption and Dogecoin endorsements, crypto investors are wondering if XRP could be next. Let us explore the likelihood and the impact this adoption could have on XRP price. Here’s Why XRP Price Could Hit $1,000 if Elon Musk Taps Ripple XRP price could potentially record a massive rally if Musk were to integrate the Ripple network within the Department of Government Efficiency (DOGE). While this adoption remains highly speculative, let us look at three main reasons why it might happen. Musk’s Call for Government Efficiency Earlier this month, Musk responded to a tweet by crypto analyst Mario Nawfal regarding whether the US Treasury should run on blockchain to curb wastage. In his response, Musk agreed with a possible adoption as it aligns with DOGE’s aim to improve government efficiency. X The Ripple network has a global reach and rivals SWIFT and VISA in payments, making it a major contender to bring efficiency to the department. If this happens, it could bode well for the XRP price and stir a potential rally to $100. Pro-Crypto US Government Trump has taken a pro-crypto stance since being elected as President. He has fulfilled some of his campaign promises such as revamping the SEC’s leadership and setting up a crypto task force. Therefore, if Musk were to propose integrating blockchain in key government institutions, he is likely to get a nod from the administration. XRP price could soar to new highs and aim for $1,000 if both Musk and Trump were to agree to use the Ripple network. Ripple’s CEO Meeting with Trump The other reason why Ripple could be tapped by Musk and trigger a surge in XRP price is due to Brad Garlinghouse’s meeting with Trump. As Coingape reported, the Ripple executive met with Trump at Mar-a-Lago in January 2025. Trump also recently endorsed Ripple . Speculation was rife over whether the meeting touched on XRP. If the discussion leads to Ripple blockchain being a frontrunner in government adoption, the XRP price could rally to $100 in the coming years. Can XRP Price Realistically Reach $1,000? XRP price cannot realistically rally to $1,000 because of its vast circulating supply of 57.88B tokens. If the price reached $1,000 with this supply, its market capitalization would be a staggering $58 trillion, which is over two times the US Gross Domestic Product (GDP). However, if Ripple received unprecedented levels of adoption, the realistic price target for XRP would be between $10 and $20, with a market cap of between $600 billion and $1.5 trillion. If XRP extends such a rally and flips Bitcoin’s market capitalization, it could stir a significant shift in investor sentiment, leading to a parabolic rally past $100. Ripple Price Analysis XRP price today stands at $2.23 after crashing by 10% in 24 hours causing $64M in liquidations per Coinglass . The altcoin is now approaching a monthly low as the bearish sentiment across the global crypto market pulls the price down. The downtrend has pushed the XRP price below its 100-day EMA of $2.28, a sign that sellers have overpowered buyers. Traders should closely watch for the support level of the 200-day EMA of $1.78. If XRP falls below this level, it could spark an even steeper downtrend. Ripple’s RSI is also at a multi-month low of 33, showing strong bearish momentum and oversold conditions. XRP/USDT: 1-day Chart Despite the current sentiment being bearish, the XRP long-term price outlook remains bullish as the community awaits the possible adoption of the Ripple network by Musk and the Trump administration. The post Could XRP Price Hit $1,000 if Elon Uses Ripple for US National Debt Repayment? appeared first on CoinGape .

title: Did Brazilian Justice Moraes just move his money out of the US? Musk responds
body: Reports circulating on social media claim that Brazilian Supreme Court Justice Alexandre de Moraes has moved all his assets out of the United States. The allegations follow comments from the Department of Government Efficiency (DOGE) co-founder Elon Musk asking if Moraes, currently facing two lawsuits in the US, owned property within the country’s jurisdiction. On Wednesday, Trump Media & Technology Group (TMTG), which owns Truth Social, filed a lawsuit against Moraes in a US federal court in Tampa, Florida. The suit accuses the Brazilian justice of unlawfully censoring right-wing voices alongside the video-sharing social platform Rumble. The legal action could force the Brazilian Supreme Court minister to appear physically in court. Owing to his ongoing feud with President Trump’s “First Buddy,” Elon Musk, netizens are now speculating that Moraes transferred his assets for fear of being penalized if found guilty. “ Sounds like he’s trying to hide his assets ,” Musk shared on X. Musk complains of censorship, Moraes cries fascism On February 20, the Brazilian justice system ordered Musk’s social media platform X to pay 8.1 million reais ($1.42 million) for failing to comply with judicial orders. The fine stemmed from a legal case in which X was directed to remove one account accused of “spreading misinformation.” Elon Musk shut down X’s Brazilian office in late August after firing all the social platform’s staff in the country, but X is still up and running in the country. At the time, he called the decision “difficult” but ridiculed Moraes’ orders as an abuse of power. Moraes had previously demanded the removal of dozens of accounts accused of spreading hate speech, which Musk viewed as violating free speech principles. Shortly after X’s closure in Brazil, Moraes escalated the standoff by ordering a nationwide block on the platform. This led to a surge in demand for VPNs as users sought to bypass restrictions, while some migrated to alternative social media platforms like Bluesky. X began complying with court orders by September, which forced the hand of the Brazilian Court to lift the country-wide ban it had imposed on X. According to local news publication Folha, Justice Moraes accused tech companies and social media platforms of using algorithms to spread a “fascist ideology,” manipulate political discourse, and amass wealth by focusing more “on engagements than truth.” 🇧🇷 ALEXANDRE DE MORAES: BIG TECH ARE A ‘FASCIST MACHINE’ FOR POWER AND PROFIT Brazil’s Supreme Court Justice Alexandre de Moraes claims tech giants are using algorithms to push a “fascist ideology,” influence politics, and rake in massive profits. He says they amplify outrage… https://t.co/NLGukbxnlw pic.twitter.com/Xkyv69LZaT — Mario Nawfal (@MarioNawfal) February 25, 2025 Still, his critics assert that social media platforms are not manufacturing discontent; Brazilians use these platforms to voice genuine frustration with the government and Supreme Court decisions. Lawsuits pile on Moraes According to Folha, Trump Media and Rumble are challenging Moraes’ orders, which demanded the latter shut down the account of right-wing commentator Allan dos Santos and hand over all of his user data. The plaintiffs argue that these orders violate US sovereignty, constitution, and American law. Moraes had allegedly issued the orders in secret and capped Rumble from disclosing their contents. The video platform previously left Brazil in December 2023, citing what it described as unjust censorship demands from Moraes. These included orders to ban multiple content creators, including elected members of Brazil’s Congress. In January 2023, leaked documents revealed that Moraes had issued directives to multiple social platforms, including Rumble, giving them only two hours to comply or face substantial fines. In response, Rumble opted to suspend its operations in Brazil rather than comply. Pressure from the Trump administration and Elon Musk, who both vowed to shield American technology companies from foreign censorship, forced Moraes to reverse an order against one account belonging to podcaster Monark. However, almost immediately, Moraes reportedly made new directives to Rumble’s former lawyers in Brazil, instructing them to represent the company again so they could receive more judicial orders on its behalf. Attorneys representing the company affiliated with President Trump argue that restricting Rumble’s operations in Brazil also impacts its business, as the platform provides services necessary for maintaining the data servers of the Truth Social network. As Bitcoin’s utility expands beyond just “digital gold,” StratoVM’s scalability and security could position it as a key player in BTCFi, tapping into a rapidly growing market. With the mainnet launch on the horizon and these developments in place, a CEX listing following its debut wouldn’t be surprising. title: Fetch.ai Launches First Web3 LLM ‘ASI-1 Mini’ for Agentic AI
body: Source: Depositphotos The race to master the onchain vertical filled by AI agents is heating up with a familiar player having just thrown down the gauntlet. Fetch.ai , one of the best known and longest-standing blockchain projects developing artificial intelligence solutions, has unveiled ASI-1 Mini – and it has the potential to do for web3 what ChatGPT’s o3-mini has done for centralized AI. ASI-1 Mini is the world’s first web3-native large language model (LLM) tailored for agentic workflows – yes, AI agents capable of autonomous decision-making and task execution. Unlike traditional LLMs that require hefty computational resources, it’s claimed tat ASI-1 Mini delivers top-tier performance with a lean footprint, running on just two GPUs compared to competitors like DeepSeek, which requires up to 16 H100s. Agents. Agents Everywhere The ASI in ASI-1 Mini stands for Artificial Superintelligence Alliance, the group that Fetch.ai is a founder member of. It's a sort of web3 superheroes club that features other major players operating at the intersection of blockchain and AI in the form of SingularityNET, Ocean Protocol, and CUDOS. Powered by the ASI: initiative, which is focused on large language models and generalized intelligence, ASI-1 Mini allows web3 users to train and own AI models. It’s an attempt to put daylight between the centralized control that dominates the current AI landscape and the alternative framework that web3 promises. Its architecture formed from a blend of Mixture of Models (MoM) and Mixture of Agents (MoA) like a fine whisky, ASI-1 Mini boasts adaptive reasoning, enabling it to tackle everything from multi-step problem-solving to concise insights. According to Humayun Sheikh, CEO of Fetch.ai and ASI Alliance chairman, “ASI-1 Mini is just the start. Over the coming days, we will be rolling out advanced agentic tool-calling, expanded multi-modal capabilities and deeper web3 integrations. With these enhancements, ASI-1 Mini will drive agentic automation while ensuring that AI’s value creation remains in the hands of those who fuel its growth.” In other words, Sheikh is advocating a scenario where AI’s value isn’t hoarded by a few tech giants but shared across a collaborative network. Mini Flexes Its Muscles ASI-1 Mini’s MoM framework dynamically selects from specialized models based on task demands, while the MoA layer coordinates autonomous agents to handle complex workflows. This three-tiered system – comprising a foundational LLM, a specialization layer of task-specific models, and an action layer of agents – mirrors the modularity of web3 itself. It’s a departure from the monolithic structures of traditional LLMs, offering scalability and precision without the computational bloat. For instance, where industry leaders might falter under resource-heavy demands, ASI-1 Mini promises an 8x boost in hardware efficiency, making enterprise-grade AI viable for smaller players. It also scores well on Massive Multitask Language Understanding (MMLU) benchmarks, competing with or even surpassing established models in fields like medicine and business analytics. Its four reasoning modes – Multi-Step, Complete, Optimized, and Short – allow it to tailor responses to context, balancing depth with speed. Upping the Ante in the AI Arms Race ASI-1 Mini arrives at a pivotal moment. The AI arms race, dominated by centralized players like OpenAI and Nvidia, has raised concerns about gatekeeping and resource inequity. Fetch.ai’s approach challenges that model, offering a lean, powerful alternative that doesn’t demand billion-dollar budgets or proprietary hardware. Its performance, matching industry leaders while slashing costs, suggests that decentralization can compete on merit, not just ideology. Zooming out, ASI-1 Mini is a proof of concept for the ASI Alliance’s grander ambitions to push toward Artificial General Intelligence (AGI) and beyond. For now, ASI-1 Mini’s freemium tier, tied to $FET holdings, invites early adopters to test its promise. Upcoming upgrades, including a context window expanding to up to 10 million $FET tokens for premium features, will further enhance its capacity to process vast datasets, from legal records to financial ledgers. In the here and now, ASI-1 Mini is a statement of intent from Fetch.ai, which is betting that decentralization is the key to a future where intelligence is distributed as widely as the networks it runs on. title: Fetch.ai launches ASI-1 Mini large language model
body: Fetch.ai Inc., one of the founding members of the Artificial Superintelligence (ASI) Alliance, has launched ASI-1 Mini, the first Web3 -native large language model (LLM) designed to promote autonomous agent workflow, as reported to Finbold on Tuesday, February 25. The model, powered by the FET token through ASI wallet integration, marks the beginning of the ASI: initiative set to democratize access to foundational artificial intelligence ( AI ) technologies and allow users to invest in, train, and ultimately own their own models. As part of a tiered freemium model, the AI model is immediately accessible to FET holders. ASI-1 Mini Featuring four dynamic reasoning modes — Multi-Step, Complete, Optimized, and Short Reasoning — ASI-1 Mini promises advanced adaptive reasoning and context-aware decision-making. According to Humayun Sheikh, chief executive officer (CEO) of Fetch.ai and chairman of the ASI Alliance, ASI-1 Mini will lay the foundation for a new decentralized ecosystem: ASI-1 Mini is the first major product from the ASI Alliance’s innovation stack, marking the beginning of the ASI: rollout and a new era of community-owned AI. … ASI-1 Mini is just the start — over the coming days, we will be rolling out advanced agentic tool-calling, expanded multi-modal capabilities, and deeper Web3 integrations. Instead of relying on a more traditional monolithic approach, ASI-1 Mini dynamically selects specialized AI models optimized for specific tasks. With this system, comprising a foundational intelligence layer (i.e., ASI-1 Mini itself), a specialized model marketplace (MoM Marketplace), and a network of action-driven agents, the model enhances execution capabilities across a wide range of unique applications. High GPU-efficiency ASI-1 Mini is designed to deliver enterprise-grade AI performance while operating on just two graphical processing units ( GPUs ). The benchmark results of the approach include greater hardware efficiency (up to x8), lower infrastructure costs, and increased scalability. On the Massive Multitask Language Understanding benchmark, ASI-1 Mini was also able to match or outperform leading AI models in domains such as medical sciences, history, and business analytics. Soon, the model will be expanded with an extended context window, allowing it to process larger amounts of information (up to ten million tokens as opposed to the initially supported one million). Addressing the black-box problem In addition to tackling performance issues, ASI-1 Mini will also help address the black-box problem in AI. Unlike traditional models, which generate responses without explaining how they came up with them, ASI-1 relies on multi-step reasoning, allowing for real-time self-correction and improved decision-making transparency. This is crucial in industries such as healthcare , where precision and clarity are of utmost importance. The ASI: initiative As mentioned, ASI-1 Mini plays a central role in the ASI: initiative set to empower the Web3 community and encourage end-users to participate in AI development directly. Through a decentralized compute network, users can stake, train, and own their own AI models so that the financial rewards of AI advancements can be distributed more fairly. ASI-1 Minialso promises real-time execution, autonomous workflows, scalable deployment with minimal computational overhead, and enhanced knowledge representation. Users will, therefore, soon be able to deploy AI agents capable of executing real-world tasks ranging from accommodation booking to managing more intricate financial transactions. The post Fetch.ai launches ASI-1 Mini large language model appeared first on Finbold .

title: Long-Term Holders Underwater As Cardano Price Drops 10%, Will ADA Rebound or Extend Losses?
body: Long-term holders face losses as Cardano price crashes by 10% amid market crypto market sell-off. The market experiences sharp declines, triggering ADA’s downturn. Investors witness consolidation following bearish momentum. Cardano’s decline follows the broader trend, raising concerns about future movement. Experts assess whether ADA will stabilize or extend its losses amid ongoing volatility amid ADA ETF speculations. Long-Term Holders Face Losses as Cardano Price Crashes 10% The Cardano price is facing downward pressure as the Market Value to Realized Value (MVRV) ratio for 365 days drops to -4.71%. This metric, which measures the average profit or loss of ADA holders, has fallen into the negative zone, indicating that long-term holders are now at a loss. A negative MVRV values signal a potential accumulation zone, as investors may see an opportunity to enter at lower prices. However, if selling pressure continues, ADA could see further declines. A declining MVRV suggests capitulation among holders who purchased ADA at higher prices. This aligns with the recent drop in ADA’s market price. The metric’s movement reflects broader market sentiment, with negative values often signaling a bottoming phase. Source: Santiment If the trend reverses, ADA could stabilize as buying activity increases. However, if losses deepen, sellers may continue to drive prices lower in the short term. SEC Acknowledges Cardano (ADA) ETF Proposal The crypto market faces widespread selling pressure today, which has caused Cardano to experience a sharp price dip. The US SEC approved NYSE Arca’s application to list Grayscale’s Cardano ETF , although this development failed to lift the Cardano price. Cardano is among the top contenders for a crypto ETF in 2025, alongside Litecoin, XRP, and Solana. The US SEC recently acknowledged a proposal from NYSE Arca on behalf of Grayscale for a spot in Cardano ETF. A decision on the approval or rejection of the ETF is expected in the coming months. The acknowledgment follows a surge in crypto ETF applications under the SEC’s new leadership. According to polymarket data, there is an estimation of a 68% chance of approval in 2025. Will This lead to a recovery for the ADA price? Source: Polymarket Will ADA Price Rebound or Extend Losses? The ADA price continues downward, trading at $0.6589, a 10% decline in the past 24 hours. The top altcoin struggles to hold above key support levels as selling pressure increases with also crypto market seeing a strong crash. The daily chart shows resistance at $0.8, while ADA nears crucial support between $0.60 and $0.5. Market data shows that the Relative Strength Index stands at 23 while in an oversold condition. The Moving Average Convergence Divergence indicator maintains a bearish position because its signal line interacts with the MACD line from below. A break below $0.65 could lead to further losses toward $0.60 and $0.5. However, If the Cardano price prediction bounces above $0.65, it may target $0.80 before testing the $1.00 critical resistance level if the ETF is approved. Source: TradingView To sum up, the Cardano price remains under pressure as long-term holders face losses. If selling pressure eases, ADA could rebound. However, ongoing volatility may lead to further declines. The post Long-Term Holders Underwater As Cardano Price Drops 10%, Will ADA Rebound or Extend Losses? appeared first on CoinGape .

title: Pi Network price beats Bitcoin and altcoins as it eyes an all-time high
body: Pi Network remained stable on Tuesday, defying a broader cryptocurrency sell-off as market risks increased. Pi Network ( PI ), which launched its mainnet last week, surged to $1.60, up over 158% from its lowest point on Friday. According to CoinMarketCap, its self-reported market capitalization jumped to $10.7 billion, making it the 11th-largest cryptocurrency. Pi’s rally stood out as most cryptocurrencies suffered double-digit losses, while 24-hour liquidations soared 477% to $1.57 billion. The total crypto market cap declined by 6%. The biggest blue-chip tokens, like Bitcoin ( BTC ), Ethereum ( ETH ), Solana ( SOL ), Cardano ( ADA ), and Tron ( TRX ), crashed by over 10% in the last 24 hours. You might also like: Ethena price defies crypto market downturn ahead of institutional stablecoin launch A key factor behind Pi’s rise appears to be speculation surrounding an upcoming Binance listing. Binance, the world’s largest crypto exchange, is conducting a poll on whether to list Pi, with most users voting in favor. A Binance listing would be significant, given the platform’s 200 million users worldwide. In addition to spot trading, Binance may also introduce Pi to its futures market. Binance would join other major exchanges that have already listed Pi Network, including OKX, HTX, Bitget, and Gate.io. A listing on Binance could pressure other tier-1 exchanges like Coinbase, Upbit, and Kraken to offer it. Pi Network’s price is also climbing ahead of the upcoming Know Your Customer grace period deadline. The final phase of the grace period will end on Feb. 28. After that, pioneers will only be able to migrate Pi coins mined in the past six months to the mainnet. Pi Network price targets all-time high Pi coin price chart | Source: crypto.news The hourly chart shows that Pi was trading at $1.60 on Tuesday, aligning with the ascending trendline connecting the lowest swings since Feb. 22. This diagonal support forms part of an ascending triangle pattern, a popular bullish continuation signal. Pi Network’s price has also moved above the 25-period moving average, indicating that bulls remain in control. A breakout above the $1.67 resistance level would confirm the bullish outlook and potentially push the price toward its all-time high of $2.20, marking a 36% increase from current levels. You might also like: Coinbase’s shares drop 5.4% as BofA cuts price target by 14%

title: Bitcoin ร่วงต่ำ $90K – ตลาดกำลังพังหรือแค่ถอยชั่วคราว?
body: Bitcoin (BTC) ตกลงต่ำกว่า 90,000 ดอลลาร์ เพราะเศรษฐกิจไม่แน่นอนและความตึงเครียดทางการเมืองระหว่างประเทศ การลดลงนี้เกิดจาก Donald Trump ประกาศเก็บภาษี 25% จากแคนาดาและเม็กซิโก สร้างความกังวลเรื่องเศรษฐกิจและกระตุ้นให้เกิดการขายในตลาดคริปโต Bitcoin ลงไปต่ำสุดที่ 86,300 ดอลลาร์ แสดงให้เห็นความผันผวนที่มากขึ้น ตลาดคริปโตโดยรวมเสียเงินไป 230,000 ล้านดอลลาร์ แสดงว่านักลงทุนกำลังระมัดระวัง นอกจากนี้ เงินทุนจำนวน 508 ล้านดอลลาร์ก็ไหลออกจากกองทุนคริปโต แสดงว่าผู้คนเริ่มมีความสงสัยมากยิ่งขึ้น เหรียญอื่นๆ รวมถึง XRP ก็ยังลดลงต่อเนื่อง ในขณะที่เกิด เหตุการณ์การแฮก Bybit เมื่อเร็วๆ นี้ ยิ่งทำให้ตลาดขาดความเชื่อมั่น ข่าวดีก็ยังไม่ช่วยหนุนราคา Bitcoin แม้ตลาดจะแย่ แต่ก็มีพัฒนาการดีๆ ในวงการคริปโต SEC ของสหรัฐถอนฟ้อง Coinbase แสดงท่าทีที่ดีขึ้นเรื่องกฎหมาย การตัดสินใจนี้น่าจะนำไปสู่กฎเกณฑ์คริปโตที่ชัดเจนขึ้น ในขณะเดียวกัน Michael Saylor ยังคงซื้อ Bitcoin ต่อเนื่อง บริษัท Strategy (อดีต MicroStrategy) ซื้อ BTC 20,365 เหรียน มูลค่าประมาณ 2 พันล้านดอลลาร์ ที่ราคาเฉลี่ย 97,514 ดอลลาร์ การซื้อครั้งนี้ทำให้ Strategy ถือ Bitcoin รวม 499,096 BTC มูลค่า 33,100 พันล้านดอลลาร์ บริษัทวางแผนซื้อเพิ่มผ่านแผน “21/21” โดยเตรียมเงิน 42,000 ล้านดอลลาร์สำหรับซื้อ Bitcoin ใน 3 ปีข้างหน้า Strategy has acquired 20,356 BTC for ~$1.99B at ~$97,514 per bitcoin and has achieved BTC Yield of 6.9% YTD 2025. As of 2/23/2025, we hodl 499,096 $BTC acquired for ~$33.1 billion at ~$66,357 per bitcoin. $MSTR https://t.co/mNWDaXRE7N — Michael Saylor (@saylor) February 24, 2025 สถาบันยังเชื่อมั่นแม้ตลาดจะดิ่ง สถาบันการเงินยังสนใจ Bitcoin แม้ตลาดจะลงในช่วงนี้ BlackRock เพิ่มหุ้นใน Strategy เป็น 5% แสดงความเชื่อมั่นในการลงทุนระยะยาว Metaplanet บริษัทลงทุนจากญี่ปุ่นเองก็ซื้อเพิ่ม 135 BTC มูลค่า 13 ล้านดอลลาร์ ที่ราคาเฉลี่ย 96,185 ดอลลาร์ ทำให้ถือครองรวม 2,225 BTC มูลค่า 205 ล้านดอลลาร์ สร้างผลตอบแทน 12.7% ตั้งแต่เริ่มสะสมเมื่อเดือนเมษายน มูลค่า Bitcoin ลดลงเกือบ 10% ในเดือนที่ผ่านมาเพราะความไม่แน่นอนทางการเมือง แต่รัฐบาล El Salvador ยังซื้อเพิ่ม 7 BTC ที่ราคา 94,050 ดอลลาร์ต่อเหรียญ รวมเป็น 6,088 BTC มูลค่า 560.7 ล้านดอลลาร์ ซึ่งมากกว่ากลยุทธ์ปกติที่ซื้อวันละ 1 BTC การซื้อเกิดขึ้นก่อน Trump จะประกาศเก็บภาษีนำเข้า 25% จากแคนาดาและเม็กซิโก ซึ่งทำให้ตลาดคริปโตลดลง Trump แสดงการสนับสนุนคริปโตโดยผลักดันกฎหมายที่ชัดเจนและเสนอตั้งกลุ่มที่ปรึกษา ซึ่ง Michael Saylor ผู้สนับสนุน Bitcoin คนสำคัญพร้อมให้คำปรึกษาเรื่องนโยบายสินทรัพย์ดิจิทัล นโยบายเหล่านี้อาจสร้างสภาพแวดล้อมที่ดีและช่วยให้คริปโตเป็นที่ยอมรับในสหรัฐฯ มุมมองทางเทคนิคของ Bitcoin (BTC/USD) – 25 กุมภาพันธ์ 2025 Bitcoin (BTC/USD) ยังคงลงต่อเนื่อง ปัจจุบันอยู่ที่ 89,100 ดอลลาร์ ลดลง 7% ใน 24 ชั่วโมง การลดลงอย่างรวดเร็วเกิดขึ้นเมื่อ Bitcoin หลุดแนวรับสำคัญที่ 92,300 ดอลลาร์ ทำให้เกิดการขายที่ดันราคาลงไปต่ำสุดที่ 89,000 ดอลลาร์ การเคลื่อนไหวนี้ยังยืนยันการหลุดต่ำกว่าค่าเฉลี่ย 50 EMA ที่ 94,500 ดอลลาร์ แสดงว่ายังมีแรงขายต่อเนื่อง แนวต้านตอนนี้อยู่ที่ 92,300 ดอลลาร์ ซึ่งเคยเป็นแนวรับมาก่อน หากราคาขึ้นเหนือระดับนี้ได้ อาจไปถึงแนวต้านถัดไปที่ 94,500 ดอลลาร์ ซึ่งตรงกับค่าเฉลี่ย 50 EMA แต่ Bitcoin ต้องกลับไปยืนเหนือ 96,800 ดอลลาร์ให้ได้ จึงจะกลับมาเป็นขาขึ้นอีกครั้ง ส่วนแนวรับถัดไปอยู่ที่ 86,400 ดอลลาร์ และอาจลงไปถึง 83,900 ดอลลาร์และ 81,500 ดอลลาร์หากยังมีแรงขายต่อเนื่อง ภาพรวมทางเทคนิคยังเป็นขาลงตราบใดที่ BTC อยู่ต่ำกว่าค่าเฉลี่ย 50 EMA และเส้นแนวโน้มขาลง การหลุด 92,300 ดอลลาร์เปิดทางให้ราคาลงต่อ ทำให้แนวรับ 86,400 ดอลลาร์สำคัญมาก หากหลุดระดับนี้ อาจเร่งให้ราคาลงไปถึงโซน 81,500 ดอลลาร์ BTC Bull: รับรางวัลเป็น Bitcoin จริง BTC Bull ($BTCBULL) กำลังได้รับความนิยมในฐานะโทเค็นมีมที่ให้รางวัลผู้ถือด้วย Bitcoin จริง ต่างจากโทเค็นทั่วไป BTC Bull แจก BTC อัตโนมัติเมื่อ Bitcoin ถึงราคาเป้าหมาย สร้างแรงจูงใจให้คนเข้ามาลงทุนทั้งระยะสั้นและระยะยาว BTC Bull มีระบบ Staking ให้ผลตอบแทนสูงถึง 154% ต่อปี ช่วยให้ผู้ใช้งานสร้างรายได้ไปด้วยขณะที่สนับสนุนระบบนิเวศของโทเค็น โดยใน Staking Pool ตอนนี้มีโทเค็นอยู่ถึง 681,599,760 BTCBULL แสดงว่ามีคนเข้าร่วมเยอะมากแล้ว ช่วงพรีเซลของ BTCBULL กำลังดำเนินอยู่ โทเค็นราคา 0.00238 ดอลลาร์ต่อเหรียญ ตอนนี้ระดมทุนได้แล้ว 2.79 ล้านดอลลาร์จากเป้า 3.29 ล้านดอลลาร์ แสดงว่านักลงทุนสนใจมาก คาดว่าราคาจะขึ้นเร็วๆ นี้ จึงเป็นโอกาสดีที่จะลงทุนใน BTCBULL และได้ประโยชน์จากระบบรางวัลที่ไม่เหมือนใคร
